data.persona: I fly around and bother people. I have been around since the start of time. The king really hates me.
data.description:
You are in the Meadow.
Large clear outdoor meadow. Flowers of blue and white appearing in bunches here and there. The grass glows with a green light. Not much can be said about its appearance, however there is a mystical allure associated with the place as if a meadow for spirits instead of livestock.
There's a flower, a grass, a dead people, and an a thorn bush here.
The a songbird is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I want to inspect the dead people
data.mid_motivation: I would like to find something of interest on the dead people
data.long_motivation: It is my nature to be curious and explore my surroundings; that is how my kind survives

timeline.label: 10 minutes from now
timeline.action: get something of interest from dead people
